title: Sellers arrested for reckless driving
body: LOS ANGELES -- Dodgers infielder Justin Sellers was arrested Saturday for driving recklessly in a West Sacramento residential neighborhood, police told a local television station.  According to KCRA-TV, Sellers was doing wheelies on a motorcycle and when police tried to pull him over, the 26-year-old fled, turning himself in after a brief chase.  The club had no comment. Ken Gurnick is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Ken Gurnick
